    Customized pretty ggplot color and fill themes

    pretty_ggplot_color_fill_themes.Rd

    Customized pretty ggplot color and fill themes

    pretty_ggplot_color(color, viridis = F, option = "plasma", drop = T, ...)

pretty_ggplot_fill(fill, viridis = F, option = "plasma", drop = T, ...)

    Arguments

    color

    Vector used for color aesthetic. Should match ggplot2::aes(color = ...) argument.

    viridis

    Logical. Whether or not to use viridis scheme if using discrete color scheme.

    option

    Argument indicating viridis palette name.

    drop

    Logical; whether or not to drop factors with no observations.

    ...

    Other arguments to pass to ggplot2::scale_color_manual(), ggplot2::scale_fill_manual(), viridis::scale_colour_viridis(), or viridis::scale_fill_viridis().

    fill

    Vector used for fill aesthetic. Should match ggplot2::aes(fill = ...) argument.

    Value

    A ggplot color or fill theme object.

    Examples

    require(ggplot2)
ggplot(iris) +
  aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Species) +
  geom_point() +
  pretty_ggplot_theme() +
  pretty_ggplot_color(color = iris$Species)

ggplot(iris) +
  aes(x = Sepal.Length, fill = Species) +
  geom_density() +
  pretty_ggplot_theme() +
  pretty_ggplot_fill(fill = iris$Species)
